alert.note: Alert for South Washington Coast (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 29 at 5:42AM PST until November 30 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT NEAR BEACHES AND HEADLANDS... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible near beaches and headlands. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast. In Washington, South Washington Coast. * WHEN...From 4 PM PST this afternoon through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
